headline: Klarna’s $14 Billion Valuation Draws Out FinTech Bargain Hunters
summary: Part of the appeal: the buy-now-pay-later lender’s implied market valuation is currently about a 50% discount to rival Affirm Holdings Inc.  The payments company from Sweden’s offering of 34.3 million shares — with more than 80% being sold by early backers — has drawn at least eight times the orders above what’s available, Bloomberg has reported.  The robust demand has prompted the banking syndicate to guide investors to expect Klarna’s initial public offering to price at $37, the top end of its marketing range or possibly higher, according to people familiar with the offering.

headline: Eightco Embraces Worldcoin As Treasury Asset With Backing From BitMine
summary: Eightco Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:OCTO) shares surged 1000% in premarket trading after the company said it raised $250 million through a private placement to adopt Worldcoin (WLD) as its primary treasury reserve asset. Eightco also appointed well-known Wall Street analyst Dan Ives as chairman of the board, signaling a bold strategic shift. Eightco priced the private placement at $1.46 per share, issuing about 171.2 million shares to raise $250 million before expenses. Backing the move, BitMine Immer

headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
summary: Klarna's IPO is unattractive; its $13-14B valuation is far too expensive. Despite revenue growth, Klarna remains unprofitable and faces intense competition.

raw.headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
raw.summary: Klarna's IPO is unattractive; its $13-14B valuation is far too expensive. Despite revenue growth, Klarna remains unprofitable and faces intense competition.
